parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per comment per subject

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.RDOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain of the parent record(s). Null for comments collected on a general comments or additional information CRF page.
datasetVariables.label: Related Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: RDOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.COSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence Number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: COSEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.IDVAR

datasetVariables.description: Identifying variable in the parent dataset that identifies the record(s) to which the comment applies. Examples AESEQ or CMGRPID. Used only when individual comments are related to domain records. Null for comments collected on separate CRFs.
datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable
datasetVariables.name: IDVAR

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.IDVARVAL

datasetVariables.description: Value of identifying variable of the parent record(s). Used only when individual comments are related to domain records. Null for comments collected on separate CRFs.
datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable Value
datasetVariables.name: IDVARVAL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.COREF

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference associated with the comment. May be the CRF page number (e.g. 650), or a module name (e.g. DEMOG), or a combination of information that identifies the reference (e.g. 650-VITALS-VISIT 2).
datasetVariables.label: Comment Reference
datasetVariables.name: COREF

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.COVAL

datasetVariables.description: The text of the comment. Text over 200 characters can be added to additional columns COVAL1-COVALn. See Assumption 3.
datasetVariables.label: Comment
datasetVariables.name: COVAL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.COEVAL

datasetVariables.description: Used to describe the originator of the comment. Examples: CENTRAL, REVIEWER, ADJUDICATION COMMITTEE, PRINCIPAL INVESTIGATOR.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: COEVAL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CO.CODTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of comment on dedicated comment form. Should be null if this is a child record of another domain or if comment date was not collected.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Comment
datasetVariables.name: CODTC

description: A special-purpose domain that contains comments that may be collected alongside other data. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49569, 2018-06-29)
label: Comments
name: CO
